name: 李曉祺
objective:
指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其實務的能力，學生必須選定一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在畢業前完成成品製作，且須有書面報告。
This course aims to teach students how to do research and write technical papers. And the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work before graduation. Each student must select the topics of a particular project under the professor's instructions. Personal or group work should be completed on the project's hardware or software perspective, and issue the paper to get the grade and credits.
schedule:
Tentative plan
Week 01-03: Project enhancement
Week 04-10: Advanced development
Week 11-14: Report writing and revision
Week 15-16: Final preparation
Week 17-18: Final presentations & evaluation
scorePolicy:
System demonstration: 30%
Final technical paper: 35%
Final presentation and defense: 35%
materials: Reference books, journals, and conference papers are to be determined based on the selected project topic.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
課程是否導入AI: AI1：使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）AI2：鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）AI5：深入探討 AI 的原理與應用（Explore the principles and applications of AI in depth）
remarks: Online discussion platform (if needed): Microsoft Teams or Google meet.
